verbose_text: Bath application of 10 muM 5-HT indeed produced a small reduction in the amplitude of ANF EPSC1 (27.0% +/- 2.8% reduction; p < 0.001, paired t test; n = 19; XREF_FIG) and increased the paired-pulse ratio (PPR; EPSC2 / EPSC1) by 10.7% +/- 2.9% from 0.82 to 0.90 (paired t test, p < 0.001; n = 19), suggesting that the reduction in ANF EPSCs could be caused by a decrease in release probability.
